attributes.action: Reform how the menopause is perceived and treated
attributes.background:
With the current system people who are experiencing the menopause have it difficult to get treatment or acknowledgment that it could be the menopause.
In addition supporting the perception of menopause.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Incorporate menopause into the Quality and Outcomes Framework (QoF) for GPs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625136

Make menopause a protected characteristic and introduce new employment rights: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634230

Fund menopause awareness training for Practice Nurses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633748
